title: BBC Local Live: Channel Islands on Thursday 29 June 2017 - BBC News
summary: jersey post fails to meet delivery targets .
guernsey 's high-rise flats 'do not use grenfell cladding ' .
vehicle fire tackled and nearby buildings evacuated .
latest from the gotland 2017 island games .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: another busy day of sport in gotland and that 's it from us for today .
tomorrow is the last day of the island games .
we 'll be back from 08:00 with more updates from the swedish island and the channel islands .

documents.title: medal table : guernsey 3rd , jersey 4th
text: medal table : guernsey 3rd , jersey 4th

documents.title: fair play to the faroe islands
text: the faroes win # islandgames2017 fair play award .
guernsey and ynys mon also nominated

documents.title: guernsey relay team secured gold in last swimming event
text: the mixed 4 x 50m freestyle relay team of jonathan beck , courtney butcher , miles munro and orla rabey won with a time of 1:38.93 .
they finished ahead of the isle of man ( 1:39.96 ) and cayman islands ( 1:40.70 ) .

documents.title: watson beats strycova to reach semis
text: guernsey 's heather watson is into the semi-finals of the aegon international in eastbourne .
she beat the world number 23 barbara strycova 6-1 1-6 6-4 .
earlier this week , watson beat world number nine dominika cibulkova .

documents.title: rnli st helier lifeboat crew to return on monday
text: the st helier lifeboat crew , who resigned en masse after the dismissal of their coxswain andy hibbs , will return to work on monday .
the crew said they were `` satisfied '' with mr hibbs reinstatement and the full formal apology provided to him .
they added they had been `` humbled '' by the support shown by islanders and jersey 's council of ministers throughout the ongoing appeal process .
author: Rob England
BBC News Online

documents.title: jersey 's new hospital 'to open by 2025 '
text: jersey 's new hospital could be eight stories high and it should be ready for people to be treated by 2025 .
that 's from the health minister speaking as the planning application was lodged today .
plans for the new £ 400m hospital will be subject to a public consultation and possible independent inquiry , but senator andrew green says work should start in january 2019 .
the debate on funding the new hospital is set for november and if approved there will be a more detailed planning application .
in 2019 they will begin demolishing existing buildings with building work on the new hospital starting in january 2020 .
author: Ryan Morrison
BBC News Online

documents.title: nine left without a home due to fire safety risk
text: nine people had to leave their homes on tuesday after jersey 's fire service ruled the building was not safe .
officers inspected dunell house in st helier on tuesday and found a serious lack of fire precautions .
tenants had to leave the properly immediately until it had been brought up to minimum standards .
states of jersey fire and rescue said the fire risk was so serious its use as living accommodation `` should be prohibited '' .
mark james , from the fire service , says so far this year six properties have been closed using the same powers .
author: Ryan Morrison
BBC News Online

documents.title: u-turn on sport strategy
text: as some of the island 's top athletes compete in gotland , guernsey 's politicians have agreed to re-instating a sport strategy for the island .
it 's after the committee responsible had earlier omitted it from future plans .
president of guernsey 's education , sport and culture committee paul le pelley admitted it was a mistake to drop the sports strategy as part of the bailiwick 's policy and resource plan .
he apologised for allowing for it being removed from his committee 's future priorities , with the states backing its re-reinstatement in the form of an amendment .
approval of the plan as a whole is still subject to a further states vote .
author: Rob Byrne
BBC News Online

documents.title: another team gold for guernsey in the pool
text: guernsey win gold in the 4x 50 freestyle mixed @ twitterid

documents.title: gold for guernsey men in 4x100m freestyle relay
text: another medal in the pool as guernsey 's men 's relay team win the 4 x 100m freestyle .
jonathan beck , tom hollingsworth , ben lowndes and miles munro finished in 3:27.53 ahead of the isle of man ( 3:30.85 ) and the faroe islands ( 3:31.55 ) .

documents.title: relay bronze for guernsey after confusion
text: guernsey women 's 4x100m medley relay team have won bronze , after a disqualification was withdrawn .
guernsey had thought they 'd won silver after the gold-winning faroe islands were disqualified , only for their result to be re-instated .
courtney butcher , laura le cras , orla rabey , and tatiana tostevin combined to finish in 4:21:06 .
they were beaten by the faroes ( 4:15:73 ) and the isle of man ( 4:16:34 ) .
confusion here , as that disqualification now withdrawn .
guernsey move back to bronze .

documents.title: silver for jersey 's kamela monks in triple jump
text: kamela monks took the silver with a 11.02 jump behind the western isles ' heather mackinnon with 11.06 .

documents.title: watson battling to get into eastbourne semis
text: heather watson and world number 23 barbara strycova are into the third set as the guernsey player looks to progress to the eastbourne semi-finals .
watson took the first set 6-1 but the czech levelled in the second , winning 6-1 .
earlier this week , watson beat world number nine dominika cibulkova .
johanna konta is currently playing world number one angelique kerber in another quarter final .
author: Rob Byrne
BBC News Online

documents.title: great night for young ci athletes
text: what a brilliant night at the athletics for the channel islands here in gotland .
guernsey 's hannah lesbirel starred , taking the gold in the 200m in a time of 24.69 seconds , with josh allaway claiming silver in the 100m .
fifteen-year-old olivia allbut celebrated silver in the 400m hurdles in her first island games , after sam dawkins had ran 48.42 to clinch silver in the 400m .
author: Tim Pryor
BBC Sport

documents.title: guernsey men 's volleyball finish 8th out of nine
text: it 's not been a games to remember for guernsey 's volleyball side .
the men did manage to salvage some pride with a 3-1 win against the cayman islands , meaning they finished eighth - a place above the caribbean competitors .
author: Rob Byrne
BBC News Online

documents.title: alderney win is island side 's best ever result
text: alderney footballers ' 3-0 victory over the falkland islands sees them secure 15th place in the competition .
it 's the side 's first win since they beat saaremaa 1-0 in 2003 .
our sports reporter james law has worked that out as 5,109 days between victories !
before today , 1-0 was their best result ever - the only other time they achieved that scoreline was against guernsey in the muratti final in 1920 .

documents.title: bronze in tennis men 's doubles
text: it 's bronze for guernsey tennis pair patrick ogier and nico robinson after they lost their doubles semi-final to bermuda .
the pair lost in a tie-breaker after losing the first set 6-3 and clawing back the second 7-5 .
jersey pair stuart parker and michael watkins beat saaremaa in their semi-final , setting up a final against bermuda .

documents.title: backstroke battle for bronze
text: two guernsey team mates found themselves battling out for third place in the women 's 50m backstroke .
tatiana tostevin ( 29:43 ) clinched bronze marginally ahead of courtney butcher ( 29:68 ) .

documents.title: gold , silver for guernsey in freestyle
text: guernsey 's miles munro has won gold in the men 's 50m freestyle , his fourth in gotland .
his 22:09 effort was more than a second ahead of fellow sarnian jonathan beck , who got silver with a 23:43 swim .
miles munro collecting his gold medal in the 50m freestyle .
jonathan beck gets silver

documents.title: silver is fourth medal for guernsey 's le friec
text: guernsey swimmer robyn le friec has won silver in the women 's 200m butterfly , her fourth games medal .
her 2:22:02 effort was n't enough to beat the faroe islands ' jana bjartalío thomsen .

documents.title: two ci medals in women 's 100m freestyle
text: it 's atherley 's sixth games medal , completing the 100m in 57:49 .
trailing her was aland 's olivia weuro and then guernsey 's courtney butcher , who swam 58:16 .
jersey 's gemma atherley gets gold in the 100m freestyle , guernseys courtney butcher gets 3rd

documents.title: channel islands dominate mountain bike event
text: medal winning rides from guernsey duo james roe ( silver ) and sam culverwell ( bronze ) have meant a team silver for the island 's mountain bike criterium team .
their efforts combined with michael serafin ( 9th ) , andrew colver ( 19th ) , and bradley vaudin ( 21st ) .
jersey did n't manage any individual medals , but together they got bronze - with their five riders placing between eighth and 29th among the 32 finishers .

documents.title: gold guaranteed in mixed doubles
text: it 's an all-guernsey final in badminton 's mixed doubles , after both pairings triumphed in their semi-finals .
jordan trebert and chloe le tissier beat a gotland pair in the semis .
they 'll now face fellow sarnians elena johnson and ove svejstrup tomorrow at 13:30 bst .
author: Rob Byrne
BBC News Online

documents.title: gold and bronze in men 's 100m backstroke
text: it 's a sixth games gold for guernsey 's tom hollingsworth , who 's come first in the men 's 100m backstroke with a time of 55:78 .
bronze went to fellow guernsey swimmer oliver nightingale , who swam a 58:95 effort .

documents.title: medals and ice cream for guernsey cycling team
text: every medal is a scoop of ice cream for guernsey 's cycling coaches - and they 're going to hate the stuff by the end of the week !
two more medals within the last few minutes have come courtesy of james roe ( silver ) and sam culverwell ( bronze ) in the men 's mountain bike criterium .
roe was pipped to the post by the isle of man , while guernsey 's andrew colver , michael serafin and bradley vaudin ( will also be pleased with their times .
author: Oscar Pearson
BBC Radio Guernsey

documents.title: silver for guernsey 's le friec
text: guernsey ' robyn le friec gets silver in the 200m butterfly , jersey 's isabel atherley comes in 4th

documents.title: gotland , a cycling town
text: locals in the town of visby may be seeing a few more bikes around because of the island games , on and off the courses .
lots of the teams and volunteers are using bikes to get between events around the town .
author: Naomi Dunning
BBC Radio Jersey, Reporter

documents.title: basketball : guernsey coach still hopeful of a bronze
text: guernsey men 's basketball team were unable to progress to the final of the island games , losing 95-75 to gibraltar this afternoon .
they 're now pinning their medal hopes on tomorrow 's third place play-off against saaremaa .
head coach adam farish said while the team is disappointed , they 'll be giving `` absolutely everything '' to try to bring a medal home for the green and whites .
author: Louise Sayers
BBC Radio Guernsey

documents.title: mountain biking : double success for guernsey
text: it 's silver for guernsey 's james roe and bronze for sam culverwell in the men 's mountain bike criterium # islandgames2017

documents.title: is that cameron ward ? no it 's daniel lee
text: earlier today we saw this slightly confusing tweet from senator paul routier , who took this of gold medallist daniel lee .
so we thought we 'd cover all the bases and include our own cameron ward , a keen supporter of team jersey .
author: BBC Radio Jersey

documents.title: silver for jersey swimmer
text: jersey 's gemma atherley gets silver in the 100m medley @ twitterid @ twitterid

documents.title: we came here for gold - sharman
text: guernsey 's football manager says he 's not hiding behind the fact that he took a young squad to gotland .
steve sharman 's side lost 4-3 in injury time to the isle of man , a team they beat 3-0 in the final in jersey two years ago to win gold .
it is tough , we came here to retain the gold medal .
i 'm not going to hide behind the fact that this is a development group , somebody else can say that .
we came here to win the gold medal and we did n't do it .

documents.title: silver for jersey 's allbut
text: 15-year-old olivia allbut takes silver in the 400m hurdles in her first island games

documents.title: jersey coach impressed by gotland performance
text: jersey women 's football coach daniel seviour said gotland 's 2-1 semi-final winning performance against his side was `` by far '' the best he 'd seen at that level .
seviour was full of praise for his side , who can still return with a bronze medal if they win their final game .
however , he said they could n't quite match their `` fantastic '' opponents .
ellen olofsson 's double sent the hosts through , with eve watson 's injury time header a mere consolation .
they did some things in that middle of the pitch that created the goals , that created the chances to get that finish .
author: Tim Pryor
BBC Sport

documents.title: basketball : guernsey out in semis
text: full time:95-75 no final place for guernsey , but head coach adam farish says they 'll be ready to fight fortomorrow # islandgames2017

documents.title: silver for dawkins in 400m
text: jersey 's sam dawkins has won silver in the men 's 400m .
he crossed the finish line in 48:42 .
jamal walton of the cayman islands won gold in 46:43 , while the isle of man 's joseph reid came third .
it 's silver for sam dawkins in the 400m in gotland .
he ran 48.42 seconds # islandgames2017

documents.title: gymnastics : want to see a gold medal pommel and floor routine ?
text: gymnastics : want to see a gold medal pommel and floor routine ?
author: BBC Channel Islands News

documents.title: guernsey shooter up her gold
text: nikki trebert 's gold medal ceremony # teamguernsey

documents.title: shooting : gold for jersey 's chapman
text: andrew chapman has won gold in the 50m prone smallbore rifle .
his 242.4 effort saw him edge ahead gotland 's bjorn ahlby ( 239.9 ) .
it 's chapman 's second medal at the games , with a silver coming in the team event in the same discipline .

documents.title: gold for lesbirel in 200m
text: hannah lesbirel takes gold in the 200m in windy conditions in gotland in 24.69 seconds # islandgames2017
@ twitterid yes girl , so proud of you !

documents.title: jersey bronze in 100m
text: tyler johnson has won bronze in the men 's 100m .
the jersey athlete crossed the line in 10:60 .
he was behind guernsey 's josh allaway ( 10:55 ) and the cayman islands ' kemar hyman ( 10.25 ) .

documents.title: silver for allaway in 100m
text: josh allaway 's 10:55 was enough to see him get silver in the 100m .
the winner was the cayman islands ' kemar hyman , who crossed the finish line in 10:25 .
in third was jersey 's tyler johnson .
guernsey 's josh allaway takes silver in the 100m in gotland in 10.55 seconds # islandgames2017
@ twitterid yes mate !

documents.title: 'a cruel end ' - gotland reporter
text: guernsey men 's footballers will miss the chance to defend their gold medal after their loss to the isle of man this afternoon .
it finished 4-3 in their semi final after a late winner sent the isle of man through and guernsey into the bronze medal playoff .
it was a cruel end to a game that ebbed and flowed in gotland .
guernsey took the lead through a neat matt loaring prod before the isle of man scored twice in first half injury time .
guernsey levelled through loaring , went behind , and levelled again courtesy of a jacob fallaize header .
but with the clock showing 92 minutes , the manxmen somehow forced the ball over the line from a scrap in the penalty area - a moment that manager steve sharman told me he could n't watch .
that goal denied guernsey a place in tomorrow 's final .
instead sharman 's young side in green and white face menorca in the bronze medal playoff .
author: Oscar Pearson
BBC Radio Guernsey

documents.title: shooting : bronze for norman
text: jersey 's mary norman has won bronze in the 25m standard pistol , coming behind the isle of white 's shelley moss and gold-winning guernsey shooter nikki trebert .
norman scored 508 , to give her a comfortable 15-point cushion over fourth-placed imogen moss .

documents.title: shooting : first gotland gold for trebert
text: guernsey 's nikki trebert has a gold medal to add to her three gotland silvers .
she triumphed in the 25m standard pistol this morning , four points ahead of isle of white adversary shelley moss , who now has three competition golds and three silvers to her name .

documents.title: gymnastics : jersey 's daniel lee
text: yesterday saw jersey 's daniel lee win a gold medal in the all round fig competition in gymnastics .
18-year-old lee was born in jersey but lives and trains in the uk .
he 's hoping for a few more medals in the individual events this afternoon .
daniel said he 's enjoying the games so far , and it really was `` the friendly games '' .
i just knew my job was to go clean on all apparatus and hopefully up the gold , and that 's what i did .
author: BBC Channel Islands News

documents.title: cycling : jersey take bronze in women 's team mountain bike criterium
text: team jersey 's jemima leach , indi malzard lisa mansell and helene monpetit have won a bronze medal in the team mountain bike criterium .

documents.title: watson through to quarters
text: heather watson has caused another upset at eastbourne , beating world number 17 anastasia pavlyuchenkova .
watson won in two sets , beating the russian 6-4 6-3 .
she now finds herself in the quarter-finals , just days after beating world number nine dominika cibulkova .
author: Rob Byrne
BBC News Online

documents.title: guernsey 's bailiff helping out again
text: yesterday it was searching for wayward golf balls , today it 's sweeping the tennis court .
guernsey 's bailiff may have a knighthood , but he 's clearly happy to roll his sleeves up and help out .
sir richard collas is missing a scintillating states debate today .
deputies are into the third day of working their way through more than 30 changes to a government plan for the future of the island .
while in gotland , the responsibility for moderating the states debate falls to deputy bailiff richard mcmahon .
the bailiff and giga management helping out at the tennis !
# teamguernsey
author: Rob Byrne
BBC News Online

documents.title: watson on the brink of another eastbourne upset
text: heather watson could be on the verge of causing another upset at eastbourne .
she 's a set up against russian anastasia pavlyuchenkova , currently ranked 17 in the world .
watson won the first set 6-4 and was 5-2 up a short while ago in the second .
on monday , she beat defending eastbourne champion dominka cibiulkova .
you can follow the latest in the third round tie here .
author: Rob Byrne
BBC News Online

documents.title: island games 2017 : jersey move back up to third
text: a gold medal in shooting has pushed jersey back up to third in the medals table .
guernsey take fourth only one gold behind , with 11 more silver medals to their name .
a lot can change in an afternoon , with jersey in fifth place this time yesterday .

documents.title: beach volleyball : jersey 's men 's team beat menorca for bronze
text: jersey 's men 's team have won a bronze medal in beach volleyball in two sets , despite appalling conditions in gotland .

documents.title: men 's basketball : guernsey in tight semi-final
text: after first quarter it 's 23-23 .
but looks like semifinal against gibraltar could be toughest game 's men have faced .
# islandgames2017 .

documents.title: badminton : jersey victory in jersey v jersey semi-final
text: in the men 's singles final mark constable and alex hutchings went head-to-head in a strange inter-island semi-final this afternoon .
as we suspected jersey won , and mark constable will go through to the final against guernsey tomorrow .
alex hutchings will play for bronze against the faroe islands tomorrow .
author: Rob England
BBC News Online

documents.title: beach volleyball : jersey win first set against menorca
text: jersey win first set in the beach volleyball against menorca @ twitterid @ twitterid
author: Naomi Dunning
BBC Radio Jersey, Reporter

documents.title: guernsey men 's football manager : 'i could n't watch '
text: men 's football : steve sharman could n't watch the final few minutes , when the isle of man scored in added time to win 4-3 # islandgames2017
bloody good fight .
from a supporter 's point of view , fantastic effort , all 4 games , especially vs favourites iom in tough conditions !
good luck for bronze !
the `` sharminator '' got stuffed !

documents.title: not so beach-like weather for volleyball tie
text: jersey 's men 's beach volleyball team has started their match against menorca for a bronze medal .
berislav bobus and rueben viera failed to make the final this morning after they lost to home side gotland
the conditions for this bronze medal match are pretty appalling .
the wind is strong and dark clouds are gathering which means rain could play its part .
the crowd is also thin on the ground due to the wind , and this game wo n't have the atmosphere of some of the other games on this court .
bobus and viera have had several hours since their semi-final match to recover and should be on good form for this game .
but both sides will have to dig deep to perform well in these weather conditions .
author: Naomi Dunning
BBC Radio Jersey, Reporter

documents.title: defending champions jersey out
text: jersey 's women have been beaten 2-1 by hosts gotland in the semi-finals of the island games football .
ellen olofsson 's quick-fire double in the first half was enough to send her side through and the defending champions jersey into tomorrow 's bronze medal match .
eve watson headed in the jersey goal in injury time but it was too little , too late .
author: Tim Pryor
BBC Sport

documents.title: water leak school : head teacher calls for new building
text: the head teacher of jersey 's les quennevais school has said a new building is `` urgently needed '' after it was announced the school would closed for two days for repairs .
recent heavy rainfall caused ceiling tiles to come down in the main hall .
no pupils or staff were injured , but the school reported there was `` significant damage '' and large parts of the school were out of use .
head teacher sarah hague said work would also be carried out to see if any other areas were damaged .
author: BBC Radio Jersey

documents.title: young guernsey rider ready
text: this afternoon 's mountain bike races get under way now , starting with the women 's individual event then the men 's is at 16:00 .
in all , there are 18 channel island competitors across the two races , with medal places also up for grabs in the team categories .
guernsey 's sam culverwell races in the mountain bike criterium later .
at 16 , he 's thought to be the # islandgames youngest cyclist @ twitterid
good luck sam ! ! ! !
# islandgames2017
author: Jen Smith
BBC Channel Islands

documents.title: women 's football : jersey lose semi-final
text: jersey 's women are beaten 2-1 by hosts gotland in the football semi-finals .
they 'll play for bronze tomorrow # islandgames2017

documents.title: full time : guernsey 's footballers out after late goal
text: guernsey vs isle of man : goal .
isle of man score a very late fourth .
guernsey trail 3-4 in the semi final .
92nd minute # islandgames2017
gutted but very proud of the lads .
guernsey vs isle of man : full time .
guernsey wo n't be in the men 's football final after a 4-3 defeat # islandgames2017

documents.title: we 're not on holiday promise
text: it might look like our reporters are off on holiday .
but no it 's not a suitcase , it 's the bag for the tv camera and tripod .
they 're heading into visby on the bus ready to film guernsey 's men in the basketball semi-finals .
author: Louise Sayers
BBC Radio Guernsey

documents.title: bjorn again guernsey fan
text: the reason they call it the friendly games .
bjorn is from gotland but has become a big fan of guernsey this week !
# teamguernsey

documents.title: tennis : joint bronze for guernsey 's joanna dyer
text: guernsey 's joanna dyer has been awarded joint bronze in the tennis women 's singles semi-final after losing by two sets to one against the isle of man 's laura feely .

documents.title: men 's football : isle of man go ahead , guernsey equalise
text: guernsey vs isle of man : goal !
iom retake the lead with 25 minutes to go .
guernsey trail 2-3 in the football semi final # islandgames2017
guernsey vs isle of man : goal !
jacob fallaize heads guernsey level .
# islandgames2017
shock
get in there big lad @ twitterid # stickitontheroof
blimey !
what a match .
6-5 aet , anyone ?

documents.title: women 's football : jersey searching for goals
text: half an hour to find two goals or jersey 's dream of back-to-back women 's football golds is over

documents.title: campion , again
text: campion is a champion , again .
jersey shooter sarah campion has got her fourth gotland gold , this time in the women 's issf 50m prone smallbore rifle .
she edged out fellow islander susan de gruchy , who got her fourth medal of the games , a silver to add to her haul .
the pair were separated by just under 10 points .
campion 's gold-winning score was 598.4 , while de gruchy posted a score of 588.6 .

documents.title: table tennis : bronze for jersey in mixed doubles
text: jersey 's mixed doubles team of kelsey le maistre and jordan wykes has earned a bronze medal after their 3-1 defeat to aland in the semi-finals .
the team lost the first set 11-3 , but recovered well to close the gap on the second set to 12-10 before winning the third set 11-5 .
the clincher was the final set , which the team lost 11-4 .

documents.title: team silver for guernsey archers
text: guernsey 's archers have added another medal to their haul , this time a silver in the compound head to head team knockout .
they were beaten 190-173 by the faroe islands in the final .
earlier , the team of mikael appelqvist , zoe gray , kieran kelly , laura le page , michael marquand , james nippers and gen whitham had beaten the isle of man 207-197 in the semi-final .
guernsey now have 13 archery medals , with swimming the only other sport with more ( 19 ) .

documents.title: women 's football : jersey two down at the break
text: football semi-final half time : very few chances here for jersey 's women .
they trail 2-0 at the break to the hosts gotland # islandgames2017

documents.title: badminton : it 's jersey v jersey ?
text: that 's right , with jersey 's mark constable and alexander hutchings through to the same semi-final in the men 's badminton singles event , it 's now an inter-island match .
we ca n't say yet , but we 're pretty sure jersey are in for a chance at the final .
with both mark and alex through in the singles , it 's set to be a jersey v jersey semi final !
matt and alex to face top seeds in doubles
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
mark beat alex in 2 .
mark plays jordan trebert from gsy for gold tomorrow , alex plays faroes for bronze
alex and matt lose out 21-17 to greenland play for bronze tomorrow against gotland

documents.title: men 's football : goals galore !

documents.title: bronze for guernsey table tennis duo
text: garry dodd and dawn morgan have lost their mixed doubles semi-final against gotland , meaning they 've got bronze .
it 's guernsey 's second table tennis medal , after they won gold in the team event .
dodd and morgan lost 3-1 .

jersey women v hosts gotland for a place in the final # islandgames2017

documents.title: guernsey vs jersey in tennis final
text: guernsey 's pat ogier will now play jersey 's stuart parker in the men 's singles final , after beating saaremaa 's priit suluste in this morning 's semi .
ogier won 6-2 , 6-2 at slite .
jersey 's parker also won in two sets this morning , overcoming menorca 's miguel alberti fuster 6-2 , 6-1 .
they 'll play tomorrow at 11:00 bst .
pat ogier into the men 's tennis final tomorrow .
he won 6-2 , 6-2 # teamguernsey
author: Rob Byrne
BBC News Online

documents.title: archery : jersey take gold in team recurve knock out
text: the recurve head-to-head knock out has seen jersey take gold against menorca .

documents.title: tennis : jersey 's stuart parker books a place in the singles final
text: jersey 's stuart parker has won a place in the final with a 6-2 , 6-1 win over menorca 's miguel alberti-fuster .
author: Tim Pryor
BBC Sport

documents.title: review blasts oversight of jersey 's arm's-length government organisation
text: an official is calling for a review of oversight for some of the groups which receive grants from jersey 's government .
karen mcconnell , the comptroller and auditor general , says the arrangements for so-called arm's-length organisations are not consistently fit for purpose .
in a recent review she raised concerns over the management of the innovation fund , which was created to help businesses get started .
her latest report looks into bodies which get grants from the states of more than £ 100,000 .
last year £ 38m was given to arm's-length government organisations .
she said there is no clear framework for setting them up in jersey and no clear structure for reviewing their work , and the value of their services should be challenged .
the states is yet to comment .
author: Sarah Scriven
News Editor, BBC Jersey

documents.title: athletics : heats under way for jersey competitors
text: the heats are under way at the athletics .
jersey 's olivia albutt makes it through to the final of the 400m hurdles .
exceptionally windy conditions for the athletes this morning .
author: Naomi Dunning
BBC Radio Jersey, Reporter

documents.title: basketball : guernsey women 's team beaten by hosts to final
text: the hosts gotland held a convincing victory over guernsey 's women 's team , beating them by 77-36 points .
guernsey will now go through to the playoffs for a bronze medal .
author: Rob England
BBC News Online

documents.title: football : jersey women 's team take on the hosts
text: jersey 's women 's footballers take on hosts gotland this lunchtime in the semi-finals at the island games .
a hat-trick from captain eve watson in a 6-0 thrashing of gibraltar yesterday helped the defending champions reach the last four .
jersey beat gotland 3-1 at the same semi-final stage two years ago .

documents.title: football : guernsey 's men 's team face semi-final
text: guernsey footballers will fight for a place in the men 's final this afternoon against the isle of man .
a win this afternoon will guarantee a medal , setting up a tie with either menorca or greenland in tomorrow 's final .
kick off is at 12:00 , and we 'll be reporting live .
author: Oscar Pearson
BBC Radio Guernsey

documents.title: island games : wednesday in
text: island games : wednesday in

documents.title: strawberry farm site neighbours critical of development plans
text: plans to build housing at the former strawberry farm site have been criticised by neighbours , who have expressed concerns over the impact on traffic flow , over-development and the area losing its rural character .
author: Guernsey Press

documents.title: vehicle fire tackled and nearby buildings evacuated
text: firefighters have tackled a vehicle fire in an industrial estate in jersey .
smoke was seen coming from a commercial building in trinity on wednesday afternoon .
crews from three fire engines tackled the blaze and nearby buildings were evacuated .
an investigation in under way into the cause .
no-one was injured .
author: Rob England
BBC News Online

documents.title: island games 2017 : what to watch out for
text: basketball
football
golf
shooting
table tennis
tennis
beach volleyball

documents.title: island games 2017 : jersey adds medals to maintain fourth spot
text: jersey 's sarah campion took her third shooting title yesterday with susan de gruchy as day four in gotland drew to a close .
the medal came in the 50m prone rifle shooting , and leaves de gruchy on two golds and a silver from the games .
it was jersey 's first gold since monday , but another gold medal came in late from daniel lee in the men 's gymnastics to see jersey stay in the fourth spot above gotland , just .
in the pool , gemma atherley also added 200m freestyle and backstroke silvers to her growing collection of swimming medals .

jersey also saw success in the women 's football , captain eve watson scored a hat-trick as defending champions jersey thrashed gibraltar 6-0 to qualify for the women 's football semi-finals , where they will play hosts gotland today .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: island games 2017 : scores on the boards
text: guernsey maintains a solid hold on the third spot in the tables , with jersey inching ahead of gotland late last night to come in fourth .
meanwhile , sark comes in 21st place , with alderney just behind in 22nd .

documents.title: gymnastics : gold for jersey 's daniel lee
text: confirmed late last night - a gold medal for jersey in the men 's fig overall individual .
daniel lee came out the clear winner in the event , seven points above his closest competitor .

documents.title: island games 2017 : guernsey thrive in the pool
text: guernsey swimmer tom hollingsworth won his fourth gold of the island games on day four in gotland .
hollingsworth claimed top honours in the 200m backstroke and helped the 4x100m medley team to a silver medal .
miles munro , also part of the relay line-up , took guernsey 's other day four gold in the 100m freestyle event .
in all guernsey have now won 19 medals in the pool .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: jersey post fails to meet delivery targets
text: jersey post is going to face closer oversight from the channel islands competition regulator after failing to meet its delivery targets for 2016 .

the channel islands competition and regulatory authorities ( cicra ) said jersey post failed to meet three of its nine `` quality of service targets '' with deliveries between jersey and guernsey falling short as well as those from jersey to the uk .

jersey post said although disappointing , its delivery services from the uk were reliant on royal mail transport services , and on more than half the deliveries last year these caused issues getting mail to jersey .
royal mail is yet to comment .
author: BBC Radio Jersey

documents.title: guernsey 's high-rise flats 'do not use grenfell cladding '
text: the guernsey fire and rescue service says a significant amount of work is ongoing with housing and building control to ensure all materials used on public and housing association buildings conform to required standards .

fire safety manager steve wilkes said the cladding used on the cour du parc in la charotterie , guernsey 's only high-rise building , is not of the aluminium composite material - or acm type - that was used on grenfell tower .
he said checks are ongoing on a number of buildings in the island .
yesterday , police reported there would not be a final death toll for the grenfell tower fire until at least the end of this year .
author: BBC Radio Guernsey

documents.title: local live across the channel islands and island games in gotland
text: welcome to our local live coverage of the gotland 2017 island games .
we 'll be reflecting on yesterday 's results and bringing you updates for jersey , guernsey , alderney and sark as they happen .
we 'll also report the latest news , weather , travel and sport for the channel islands .
if you want to comment , have a question or send us a photo then get in touch by email .
author: Rob England
BBC News Online
